name: DailyLoveQuote
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Now you can start every day with love. ❤ “One word frees us of all the weight and pain of life: that word is love.” – Sophocles ❤ “All you need is love.” -- Paul McCartney This “Daily Love Quote” Amazon Alexa Skill Channel is being provided for you by www.TheLoveText.com Once you enable this Alexa skill you can say: 🎙 Alexa, open Daily Love Quote 🎙 Alexa, start Daily Love Quote 🎙 Alexa, launch Daily Love Quote 🎙 Alexa, what’s my news?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
